channel.title: MacBook on Stefanos Vardalos
channel.description: Recent content in MacBook on Stefanos Vardalos

item.title: MacBook : Dev Setup
item.description: MacBook : Dev Setup I have been using mostly linux for many years now but, I just got a new Macbook Pro (2018). I had moderate previous experience with macOS before but I never had one of these machines as my main gear. After my initial “wow” moments with its screen and some “wtf” moments with its (lack of) ports, I started migrating my enviroment and searching for whatever I had to install to make this beast my own.
